Articles.Content:
I really like to use this forum, is it bugged for you guys too? My posts seem to be vanishing and some posts appear in random intervals and i am really confused about posting anything here and which posts appear. Really confusing.

Hi and i'm also new to this game, i tried demo and i didn't liked it, but few months later and i found career mode and some tutorials in game, now i decided i need to buy this, and i play it a lot (more than i should lol).

Edited May 9, 2014 by cpx

Hello cpy, and welcome to the forum. (I moved your post to its own thread. ) Anyway, your first few posts must be approved by moderators until the forum software is sure you are not a spambot. So if you're posts haven't been showing up right away, or in the order you submitted them, that's why. However, you're past that stage now and shouldn't have anymore problems.
Thanks, it works now. Gotta love building them space ships
